about_the_game:
If you're interested in access to awesome, unique DEVOUR content, you will love the DEVOUR: Supporter Edition! Purchasing this DLC is also a great way to support the DEVOUR development process, so that we can continue to bring you new and exciting content.

DEVOUR: Supporter Edition contains the following:

Zara's "Screamer" Outfit



Kai's "Pyromaniac" Outfit



Anna's "Fallen Angel" Outfit



Frostbite Flashlight



Hemorrhage Flashlight



Glitterbomb Flashlight



6 stunning 4K desktop wallpaper images


3 variations featuring Anna and 3 variations with the classic DEVOUR logo.

Original DEVOUR painting by Jarel Threat (Digital Copy)


High-resolution (3900x5400px) digital image. Perfect for printing!

Official 26-page Game Design Document (Signed Digital Copy)


High-resolution PDF digitally signed by the entire development team. This is an internal document used to pitch DEVOUR to various platforms or publishers. Please note that it does not get updated as we release new maps and only contains DEVOUR content up to the release of The Inn.

Official map floorplans


Several high-resolution concept designs for each map. These are internal documents used by our environment artist to pitch a map to the rest of the team before it is created.

Non-refundable

The items and content included with this DLC cannot be revoked once granted. Therefore please be aware that this is a non-refundable purchase.

Where to find the assets?

content_descriptors.notes: This Game may contain content not appropriate for all ages, or may not be appropriate for viewing at work: Frequent Violence or Gore, General Mature Content

Official 26-page Game Design Document (Signed Digital Copy)


High-resolution PDF digitally signed by the entire development team. This is an internal document used to pitch DEVOUR to various platforms or publishers. Please note that it does not get updated as we release new maps and only contains DEVOUR content up to the release of The Inn.

Several high-resolution concept designs for each map. These are internal documents used by our environment artist to pitch a map to the rest of the team before it is created.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10.15
  • Processor: Intel i5 or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 3GB Video RAM
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: 10.15
  • Processor: Intel i7 or equivalent
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 4GB Video RAM
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 8 GB available space

name: DEVOUR: Supporter Edition

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 - 64 bit
  • Processor: Intel i5 or new-gen i3 / AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 970 / AMD Radeon R9 290
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 - 64 bit
  • Processor: Intel i7 or AMD equivalent (AMD FX 9500+ Series)
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 970 / AMD Radeon R9 290 or greater
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection

short_description: If you're interested in access to awesome, unique DEVOUR content, you will love the DEVOUR: Supporter Edition! Purchasing this DLC is also a great way to support the DEVOUR development process, so that we can continue to bring you new and exciting content.
supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Korean, Polish, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Spanish - Latin America, Turkish, Thai, Portuguese - Portugal, Czech, Dutch, Finnish, Norwegian, Portuguese - Brazil, Romanian, Hungarian
*languages with full audio support
